price: Allah’a ve ahiret gününe iman edip, Allah’ın kendilerine  rızık olarak verdiklerinden infak etselerdi ne olurdu? Allah onları bilendir.
arabic: وَمَاذَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِهِمۡ عَلِيمًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamādhā ʿalayhim law āmanū bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wa-anfaqū mimmā razaqahumu al-lahu wakāna al-lahu bihim ʿalīman
